column4: try this, unplug the device, oprn a terminal and type  tail -f /var/log/messages    then plug the device in, and wait 10 seconds, then type <ctrl+>c to end the prev cmd,,, then look at the messages recorded..
copy and paste that to pastebin if needed
try df -a   and then whatever mount point it has do a chown
